ExecLegacyContent defines a Msg to be in included in a MsgSubmitProposal
to execute a legacy content-based proposal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"MsgExecLegacyContent is used to wrap the legacy content field into a message.\nThis ensures backwards compatibility with v1beta1.MsgSubmitProposal.","type":"object","properties":{"authority":{"description":"authority must be the gov module address.","type":"string"},"content":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{},"description":"content is the proposal's content."}}}}},"description":"MsgExecLegacyContent is used to wrap the legacy content field into a message.\nThis ensures backwards compatibility with v1beta1.MsgSubmitProposal.","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
